value.name: Limerick neighborhood homicide victim identified
value.description: Antonio Henry, 43, of Louisville, died of a gunshot wound according to the Jefferson County Coroners Office. Henry was found inside a vehicle around 8:30 p.m. at 8th and Kentucky. The Louisville Metro police homicide unit is investigating the case.

value.name: Pair Arrested In Murder Of Pastor At His Home
value.description: Two people have been arrested in the killing of a 55-year-old local pastor. Police said 25-year-old Antonio Henry and a 16-year-old male were charged late Sunday night with felony murder and ...

value.name: Three die in Soesdyke-Linden Highway accident
value.description: A TRAGIC accident on the Kairuni Public Road, Soesdyke-Linden Highway on Sunday has claimed the lives of three persons, including an eight-year-old child

value.name: 43-year-old man fatally shot in Limerick neighborhood identified by officials
value.description: The man who was fatally shot in the Limerick neighborhood Sunday night was identified by the Jefferson County Coroner's Office. Around 8:30 p.m. police were dispatched to the intersection of 8th and Garland Avenue on a report of a shooting,

value.name: Police: Man found shot to death inside vehicle in Louisville
value.description: When officers arrived at the scene, they found 43-year-old Antonio Henry inside dead from an apparent gunshot wound. No other information was made available. Police do not have any suspects.
